question: Which Union Ministry launched ‘Indian Report on Digital Education, 2020’?
option2: Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
explanation:
Union Ministry of Human Resource Development has recently launched the ‘Indian Report on Digital Education, 2020’.
The report has details on innovative methods adopted by Education Departments of various States and Union Territories for providing inclusive education to children at home. Initiatives of HRD Ministry including DIKSHA platform and Swayam Prabha TV Channel are highlighted.
